about_the_game:
On a bright morning, you - a raccoon - go for a walk in a village by the river. You listen to the villager's conversations and perform small tasks to get the villager's life going.

There are several dens in tree trunks across the village. By entering them you can descend into the Cave of Time. Here you see the memories in villagers' past as flowers in the river of time. You can open these memory flowers with the memory leaves earned from the village.

The memory tells a story from the villagers' past. Some or all of the characters in this memory are the villagers that he has encountered in the village. After the memory is played out, you match those characters with the villagers.

The game proceeds with exploration of the Village and the Cave of time, with the goal of uncovering the life stories of all the villagers - navigating their present, past (and future)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In the hills by the river is a small village of handful souls. A raccoon walks through them and their past lives discovering their joys and sorrows. Spend your time in an idyllic rustic environment unlocking the villagers' memories and solving environmental puzzles.
